experiences.title: Software Development Engineer
experiences.description: Refined data processing in model build and analysis pipeline, transforming raw data into inferred values with comprehensive automated unit and integration testing. Optimized system scalability through time complexity improvements, enhancing overall performance. Troubleshot and resolved model build pipeline failures in staging and production environments using CloudWatch logs. Streamlined and automated DevOps processes by restructuring CI/CD workflows with GitHub Actions. Implemented data export/import functionality for time-series data purge and restore, improving database efficiency and data lifecycle management.
reference_context: Scaled system performance via time complexity optimization
experiences.reasoning: The role focused on improving data processing workflows and system performance, essential for a research lab dealing with large datasets.

experiences.title: Software Development Engineer
experiences.description: Implemented OFSAA LLFP fintech solutions in SIT, UAT and provided post-implementation support in production environments for two international financial banking firms. Engineered six GUI-based workflow runs for ETL pipelines with numerous tasks and integrated them with backend scripts to process data from pre-staging to end-user report generation stage. Enhanced UI for Individual Assessment (IA) module based on XML Forms Framework by customizing four UI Forms and eight PL/SQL scripts to process over 300,000 customer records by proposing to debug existing legacy code. Generated PL/SQL scripts for data manipulation and validation to automate manual tasks for filtering source data, reducing execution times by 20% while generating end-user reports containing customer data for over six months. Documented technical designs and deployed code packages across environments via WinSCP/PuTTY client-server apps.
reference_context: Implemented fintech solutions for financial institutions
UI and script customization for data processing
Execution time reduction in data reporting
experiences.reasoning: The work involved developing and optimizing fintech solutions in various environments, crucial for financial services software.

experiences.title: Embedded C++ Developer
experiences.description: Designed software modules for ARM Cortex-M3 embedded server sensor device to measure subzero temperatures. Troubleshot bugs and optimized the system to handle real-time sensor data via RPC transfer protocols.
experiences.reasoning: The role involved designing and debugging sensor software, imperative for practical applications in extreme conditions.

experiences.title: Python Developer
experiences.description: Successfully modeled discrete mathematical Rough Set Theory concepts for Sensor Data Mining using Python. Designed custom-built library to process 65,536 objects in 2 minutes with accuracy of 95% using linear regression.
reference_context: Modeled mathematical concepts for data mining
experiences.reasoning: This internship focused on applying mathematical theories to practical problems, essential for data-driven research.
